entities.name: justin finch-fletchley
entities.description: Justin Finch-Fletchley is described as lying on the floor, rigid and cold, with a look of shock frozen on his face. He was Muggle-born.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter is mentioned as someone Justin let slip to about being Muggle-born

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as tripping over something lying on the floor and finding Justin Finch-Fletchley and Nearly Headless Nick.

entities.name: nearly headless nick
entities.description: Nearly Headless Nick is described as floating immobile and horizontal, six inches off the floor, with his head half off

relationships.description: Harry found Justin Finch-Fletchley lying on the floor.
Harry also found Nearly Headless Nick floating immobile and horizontal, six inches off the floor.
